title: tIrAda viLaiyATTuppiLLai
sahitya:
tIrAda viLaiyATTuppiLLai kaNNan teruvilE peNgaLukkOyAda tollai


caraNam 1    tinnap-pazham koNdu taruvAN pAdi tinginra pOdilE taTTip-parippAn
Ennappan ennaiyan enrAl adanai eccil paDutti kaDittuk-koDuppAn
    caraNam 2    tEnotta paNDangaL koNDu enna sheidAlum eTTAda uyarattil vaippAn
mAnotta peNNaDi yenbAn shaTru manamagizhu nErattilE kiLLi viDuvAn
    caraNam 3    azhaguLLa malar koNDu vandE ennai azha azha sheidupin kaNNai mUDikkoL
kuzhalilE shUTTUvEn enrAn ennai kuruDAkki malarinai tOzhikku vaippAn
    caraNam 4    pinnalaip-pin ninizhuppAn talai pinnE tirumbu munnE shenru maraivAn
vannap-pudu shElai tanilE puzhudi vAri shorinde varuttik-kulaippAn
    caraNam 5    pullAnkuzhal koNDu varuvAn amudu pongit-tadumbu nar-gItam paDippAn
kaLLAl mayanguvadu pOlE adanai kaNmUDi vAi tirandE kETTiruppOm
    caraNam 6    angAndirukkum vAi tanilE kaNNan ArEzhu kUTTerumbaip-pOTTu viDuvAn
engAgilum pArtaduNDO kaNNan engaLai sheiginra vEDikkai onrO
    caraNam 7    viLaiyADa vAvenrazhaippAn vITTil vElaiyenrAl adaik-kELAdizhuppAn nI
iLaiyArODADik-kudippAn emmai iDaiyir pirindu pIo vITTilE sholvAn
    caraNam 8    ammaikku nallavan kaNDIr muni attaikku nallavan tandaikkum ahdE
emmait-tuyar sheyyum periyOr vITTil yAvarkku nallavan pOlE naDappAn
    caraNam 9    kOLukku mighavum samartthan poimai suTtiram pazhi sholla kUshA shuzhalgaL
AlukkishaittapaDi pEshi teruvil attanai peNgaLaiyum aghAdaDippAn
